summary: With the world on the brink of WWII, a violent rivalry over the same woman tears two brothers apart. Seeking redemption, the younger brother escapes to the front lines of battle.
cast: Rory Finn|Daniel Attwell|Fiona Bruce|Gordon Winter|Clare Fettarappa|Natasha Staples|Owen Aaronovitch|Louisa Adams|Roger Alborough|Charlie Allen|Craig Appleton|Nick Beeby|Max Birkett|Peter Birkett|Mkaya Carrigan|Ian Church|Valentine Czerny|Jack Deeley|Edmund Dehn|Tony Dudman|Tom Dussek|Stephan Erdman|Geoff Goodyear|Rex Heasman|James Hender|Pip Henderson|Boris Hiestand|John Hinton|Tommy Jarvis|Amber Kennedy|Vincent Kerschbaum|Klemens Koehring|Michael Koltes|Jane Lesley|William Ludwig|Craig Machell|Carl Mitcherley|Daniel Morris|Paddy O'Keeffe|Ellie Piercy|Becca Pownall|Matt Ray Brown|Robert Rowland|Vince Scope|Lewis Scopes|Amy Shouler|Peta Taylor|Dexter Tiranti|Patrick Vincent|Alex Vnoucek|Finley Whale|Kevin Wilkins|Jessica Willard
keywords: world war two|brother|brother brother relationship|soldier|british soldier
title: Brothers of War
